preview.title: About Me
preview.content:
Sourin Pal

Full Stack Developer

I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer specializing in backend development with Node.js. Currently pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering at Netaji Subhash Engineering College (Graduating 2026).

I enjoy building projects that solve real-world problems and improving my skills in DSA, backend, and AI.

Interests

  • Backend Development
  • AI-Powered Applications
  • System Design
  • Competitive Programming
  • Technical Blogging
  • Open Source Contribution
